review_text: App crashes every time I try to upload a photo. Using Samsung Galaxy S21, Android 13.
Amazing app! The new dark mode feature is exactly what I needed. Works perfectly!
Can't login since update. Keep getting 'Invalid credentials' error. Very frustrating!
Would love to see a calendar integration feature. It would make scheduling easier!
Data sync not working. Lost all my notes from last week. Unacceptable!
Love the new feature! Best productivity app I've used.
Please add offline mode. I travel a lot and need access without internet.
App is extremely slow since last update. Takes 30 seconds to open. iPhone 12 Pro.
Too expensive for what it offers. $9.99/month is way too much.
Great app but missing export to PDF feature.
Constant crashes when switching between tabs. Pixel 7, Android 14.
Works perfectly! No bugs, great UI, excellent support.
Would be nice to have widget support for quick access.
App deleted all my data after update. No backup option. Lost months of work!
Poor customer service. Sent 3 emails, no response yet.
Incredible update! The collaboration features are game-changing.
Please add biometric authentication. Face ID or fingerprint would be great.
Cannot attach files anymore. Error: 'File format not supported'.
App needs better search functionality. Current search is too basic.
Battery drain is insane! App uses 40% battery in 2 hours. iPhone 13.
